item.title: Beogram 4002 (5503): When Disaster Strikes! - Replacement of the Solenoid Switch and Restoration of a Melted Solenoid
item.description:
It seems my Beogram 4002 customer in Arizona is having arm lowering issues again, just a short time after my last repair in December 2022. Upon opening the unit, I discovered the solenoid had completely melted down due to a faulty arm extension I had previously installed. This prevented the solenoid switch from deactivating, leading to overheating and ultimately, failure. To fix this, I crafted a new solenoid coil and replaced the melted one...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-5503-when-disaster-strikes-replacement-of-the-solenoid-switch-and-restoration-of-a-melted-solenoid/
